rukus.text: Sari prasasa alaha la'i hai, jisa ne apane bade (muhamada) upara kitaba utari ate usa vica ko'i gujhala nahim rakhi
Sapurana taura te ki uha alaha de valom sakhata saza tom savadhana kara deve. Ate imana vali'am nu khusakhabari de devo jihare cage karama karade hana, unham la'i caga badala hai
Ate unham lokam nu bhai'a bhita kara di'um jihare akhade hana ki alaha ne putara bana'i'a hai
Unham nu isa gala da ko'i gi'ana nahim ate na unham de pi'u dadi'am nu, iha bahuta vadi gala hai jihari unham de muha vicom nikala rahi hai. Uha sirafa jhutha akhade hana
Japada hai tusim unham tom pichom dukha nala apane apa nu nasata kara devoge. Jekara uha isa gala upara imana na li'a'e
Jo kujha dharati upara hai, unham nu asim dharati da sigara bana'i'a hai. Tam ki asim lokam nu parakhi'e ki unham vicom kauna cage karama karana vala hai
Ate asim dharati di'am sari'am vasatu'am nu ika padhara maidana bana devange
Ki tusim samajhade ho ki gufa te pahara vale sadi'am nisani'am vica bahuta ahima nisani'am si
Jadom unham nojavanam ne gufa vica sarana la'i phira unham ne kiha ki he sade palanahara! Sanu apane kolom rahima di bakhasisa kara, ate sade mamale nu thika karade
Isa la'i asim gufa vica unham de kama vica salam taka ninda da parada pa dita
Phira asim unham nu cuki'a, tam ki asim pata kari'e ki dovam varagam vicom kauna rukana de samem di zi'ada ate sahi ginati karada hai
